title: All sold - 2 graded T212's and 2 graded T213's

posts.post_title: All sold - 2 graded T212's and 2 graded T213's
posts.post_content:
For Sale (2nd price reduction on remaining cards) - Two graded T212's and T213's.  Prices include shipping, please message if interested and thanks for looking.  Note: NC residents add 6.75% to any agreed upon price to cover ST.  

1911 T212 Obak Thompson PSA 3  Sold

1911 T212 Obak Kippert PSA 5  $230.00 venmo no fee or Sold

T213 Coupon Type 2  Sam Crawford PSA 1  Sold

T213 Coupon Type 2  Clark Griffith  Sgc 1.5  Sold
Bump for price reduction and sale updates.
